body.name: Handheld Garment Steamer for Clothes, 1800W Portable Iron with Steam for Travel & Home, 2 in 1 Fabric Wrinkle Remover 20S Fast Heat-up for Any Fabric, 20 Min of Use Time, 5.9ft Power Cable(120V ONLY)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 9 mins
features: Wrinkle-Free in Seconds: The handheld steamer has 1800W high power, heats up in just 20s. The powerful steam quickly smooths out wrinkles and leaves no water stains. It outperforms traditional irons, saving your time

User-Friendly Design: The steamer for Clothes is equipped with a simple one-button control, allowing you to start and stop steam ejection effortlessly. The large detachabl 300ml water tank provides 15-20 minutes of use time. Iron multiple garments with ease

Safe and Durable: The machine features an integrated die-cast aluminum panel for fast and uniform heat conduction. Flexible switch between dry and wet pressing modes. The bottom pump is designed to avoid steam clogging. The international standard heat-resistant power cord ensures its long-lasting performance and safety

Portable: Weighing just 1.6 pounds, long grip is not tired. The longest side only 10.4 inches. The 5.9ft power cord can meet most needs. 360°non-leaking design, suitable for all fabrics. Perfect for home and travel use

Additional: Free with package: hair brush *1, cloth brush *1, oven glove *1. Please read the instructions before use. The cleaner designed for use with 120V only, please check the local voltage before purchase

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Large Water Tank The 300ml/10.56oz water tank is enough to use the steamer for 15-20 minutes without interruption. The detachable design makes it easier to refill the water Long Power Cord The 5.9ft/1.8m power cord meets usage requirements without taking up too much space. The use of international standards of high temperature power cord needn't worry about melting caused by leakage 4 Additional Accessories Cloth Brush: Remove lint from fabric surface Hair Brush: Remove dust from fabric surface Oven Mitt: Avoid burns during ironing Measuring Cup: Easy to add water

How To Iron 1.Lay the clothes flat or hang. Keep clothing as flat as possible and free of protrusions. 2.Tighten the clothes. Gently use the steamer to remove wrinkles section by section. Move the steamer slowly, but don't stay too long. 3.For deep wrinkles, iron repeatedly and extend the residence time appropriately. 4.Hang or fold the ironed clothes. Prevent wrinkles from reappearing during cooling.

Notes: 1. The products will be checked before sell to ensure quality. Sometimes there may be water left in the tank. This is normal and does not affect use, nor does it mean that you received a used product. 2. The product is only suitable for use at 120V. Such as the America, Canada. Please check the local voltage before purchasing. 3. Please read the instruction carefully before use, and check the ironing temperature of the clothes. Common types of fabrics that can be ironed include cotton, wool, linen, polyester. 4. It is best to use pure or distilled water. The use of poor quality water will form scale inside the machine. Please clean according to the instructions. 5. Do not direct the steamer to humans or animals during use. Power should be cut off in time when not in use or after use. Empty the tank. Keep out of reach of children and pets until cool. 6. We attach great importance to customer experience. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact the service team at any time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars lots of steam, quick steam generation, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This steamer works well and is easy to use. It is light weight and comfortable to hold. It comes with a diffusing shield for clothing and a brush for things like furniture, carpets, etc.The water reservoir is small, but hold enough to generate a lot of steam; plenty for two or three garments. The hole for adding water is very small making it a bit of a challenge to fill without spilling. No worries, just fill it over the sink.The steamer heats up very quickly, going from off to generating steam in under 30 seconds.One short-coming of this unit is the instructions. There is useful information in there, along with some utter nonsense. For example: "....turned to the second gear to emit steam for wet soup operation"., and this puzzler, "Prevent steam burns by spraying steam onto hands".Finally, IMO this steamer (and all others) represent a very real risk for severe burns. Steam does not forgive a mistake. All possible safety measures should be observed.I like this steamer and, if used with the proper precautions, I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had numerous similar products over the years. This is by far the best one. It works flawlessly. Just the right amount of steam to do the job quickly and efficiently without too much moisture, etc.Can’t go wrong with this product. The best option I’ve found for getting the job done. 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Brave little steamer
reviews.reviewText: Boldly going where other steam irons can't. It's small, heats up quickly, and gets going getting wrinkles out. The light turns green then you put it into second gear for steam. You can use it as a dry iron too. The mitten is cute. It works great, I do wish the cord was a tad longer. But other than that two thumbs up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this it works great! It is super easy to use and comes with different attachments. I highly reccomend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with this handheld little steamer! Heats up and starts working very quickly and works just a well if not better then another much more expensive one I have! Love that it comes with some different accessories like a mitt to protect you hand and 2 streamer attachments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am mostly a vertical steamer, so I really like that this kit comes with a mitt to protect the hand holding the clothes! Clean, cute mitt for clean, pressed clothes. I wear a lot of fancy dresses and skirts that wrinkle in a flash but don't need cleaning, but I feel like this steamer will iron and clean, which I like! I am looking forward to all the nice, steamed clothes I am going to have in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This handheld steamer is very efficient. It works very well and fast. The steamer heats up in less than 20 seconds and does excellent work removing all the wrinkles without leaving any water stains. The steamer is lightweight and the quality is excellent. Very durable. The only downside is that it's a little bigger than I expected so it does take some room to store it.
